entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
